long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Gerbil Time Tracker from enable.services is a Chrome extension which allows seamless integration with the enable.services Time Logs for Sugar (SugarCRM's  CRM product) add-on to allow quick and simple start-stop time management on Sugar Module items (e.g. Cases, Tasks, etc.) providing reporting of complete logging of time used by CRM Users on their assigned items with Sugar.
